channel.title: Comments on: I am a terrible flirt
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: By: Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I must be going to the wrong parties.
item.content:encoded: I must be going to the wrong parties.

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: I don't feel that, in the modern world today, a man with scintillating wit such as yourself should need to concern himself with the tedium of conventional flirting. Certainly if I was a laydee (sic), the second point would have me weak at the knees with anticipation. The third however would probably have put me in a more introspective mood, fraught with concern for the poor bees.
item.content:encoded: I don’t feel that, in the modern world today, a man with scintillating wit such as yourself should need to concern himself with the tedium of conventional flirting. Certainly if I was a laydee (sic), the second point would have me weak at the knees with anticipation. The third however would probably have put me in a more introspective mood, fraught with concern for the poor bees.

item.title: By: Jaspreet
item.dc:creator: Jaspreet
item.description: Made me laugh so much our PA asked me what I was doing :-)
item.content:encoded: Made me laugh so much our PA asked me what I was doing ðŸ™‚
